name: Axe the Dead
description:
Save all people and don't die!

Created for AsylumJam, and unintentionally our game fits in projcam theme haha
Controls:
Arrow keys: Move the player.
Z(In game): Attack
R: Restart layout
Enter(on death): Restart game
L: Login on GameJolt

Follow us!

Programming and music/sfx:
@canoi12

Design and art:
